string.text: Wow!
Hi!
Where is the money for the job?
Find my assistant, he will have your money!
Okay, but this time no cheating!
Who are you?
Lecturer they call me! And these ugly varments are my team!
What are you and your people are doing here?
Me and the guys are resting here. Need to take a break, then we'll go to Pripyat!
What do you know of Pripyat?

I know that it is an old ghost town from way back in the time of Communism. Communism took place because of assholes like Lenin and Stalin. I think now it is swarming with monsters and Monolith in droves. Those who went there before me did not come back!
Do you think it's very dangerous?
No doubt, those who went there never returned.
You seen any military nearby?
I have not seen any military. However I did hear about some a long time ago.
What did you hear about the military?

According to rumors they appeared somewhere in Radar near the antenna. They split up and some continued to Pripyat. We have been here for a day now and have not seen any military. Maybe the road to here is blocked.
So you think the military cut of the road to Radar?
Well I suppose they could have. They do not joke around, they are very tough guys and they act quickly and smoothly. It is strange that the way here would be blocked.
Why they did they go to Pripyat?
I do not know and I am afraid to think what they might be up to. I can only guess what they have in mind.
Maybe you have a job?
Well there is one job, but it's not an easy one. You want it?
Yes, I'm not scared!
Maybe not, but it sure scares me!
I understand. Hey, money is money!

Well that's good! The job is to find my scouts Loma and Beam! They went to Pripyat, I had decided not to go into the jaws of a tiger, so I sent my best guys! Find them, if alive bring them back here, if not bring me their weapons! Do you want this job for 2,000 rubles?
Well from your hand to my hand! I mean, ok it's a deal. But can you give a little more money?
Give a little more money, let's say 4,000 rubles, okay?
That's plenty for this job!
Ok, I'll wait for you here!
Task accomplished!
Well give me the PDA!
Hold on, the money first!
A little brazen aren't we, when you consider that the job turned out to be easy!
Easy my ass ... I'll piss on you!
You'll have to catch me first! Maybe I'll piss on you first!
Lol, ok good luck!
I can give no more money. If you want you can keep the stuff!
No money! Free!
I have not found them!
Find them faster, if you want to get the money!
I found your guys. They were killed, here are their weapons!
Thank you! So they died, then I think it makes no sense to go to Pripyat! One problem remains, I cannot give you money for the job. My deputy has disappeared with all the money!
Well I'll find him! Tell me where to find him. I hope you are not trying to trick me!
No! I think he did not get to far yet. I'll mark your map where he might be. I noted here or here! Bring him back, or at least get his PDA and stuff!
Well, wait for me!
I have not yet found them.
Seek them quickly! I cannot wait forever here! Good luck!
